    public class CalculatorViewController
extends javax.swing.JPanel

        private javax.swing.JButton createButton(java.lang.String text,
                                         java.lang.String ac,
                                         java.awt.Color fg,
                                         java.awt.Color bg,
                                         java.awt.event.ActionListener handler)
        Purpose: This method creates new button using the argument as configuration
        Parameters:
        text - The text showed on the button
        ac - The ActionCommand for the button
        fg - The foreground color of the button
        bg - The background color of the button
        handler - The ActionListener object of the button
        Returns:
        JButton The newly created button
